name: Davidoff - 702 Series - Special R
additionalNotes: Davidoff unveils a medium to full-bodied profile characterized by spicy flavors of coffee with cream, dark chocolate and earth in the 702 Series. An oily Ecuador Habano wrapper conceals a rich combination of binder and filler tobaccos from the Dominican Republic in a handful of classic Davidoff formats. Depart from the traditionally milder flavors Davidoff delivers and taste a cigar with pronounced intensity.
